016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.certificates.client;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.certificates.spi.CertificatesProvider;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.Attributes;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.Link;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.ResourceObject;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.client.JsonApiClient;
024import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.providers.JsonElementMessageBodyReader;
025import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.providers.JsonElementMessageBodyWriter;
026import com.exoreaction.xorcery.server.api.ServerResourceDocument;
027import com.exoreaction.xorcery.server.api.ServiceResourceObject;
028import jakarta.ws.rs.client.Client;
029import jakarta.ws.rs.client.ClientBuilder;
030import org.bouncycastle.openssl.PEMParser;
031import org.bouncycastle.pkcs.PKCS10CertificationRequest;
032import org.bouncycastle.util.io.pem.PemObject;
033import org.bouncycastle.util.io.pem.PemWriter;
034
035import java.io.ByteArrayInputStream;
036import java.io.StringWriter;
037import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
038import java.security.cert.CertificateFactory;
039import java.security.cert.X509Certificate;
040import java.util.List;
041import java.util.Optional;
042import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
043import java.util.concurrent.CompletionException;
044import java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage;
045import java.util.function.Function;
046
047import static java.util.stream.Collectors.toList;
048
049public class ClientCertificatesProvider
050        implements CertificatesProvider {
051
052    private final JsonApiClient client;
053    private final CertificatesClientConfiguration certificatesClientConfiguration;
054
055    public ClientCertificatesProvider(ClientBuilder clientBuilder,
056                                      Configuration configuration) {
057        this.certificatesClientConfiguration = () -> configuration.getConfiguration("certificates.client");
058
059        Client client = clientBuilder
060                .register(JsonElementMessageBodyReader.class)
061                .register(JsonElementMessageBodyWriter.class)
062                .build();
063
064        this.client = new JsonApiClient(client);
065    }
066
067    @Override
068    public CompletionStage<List<X509Certificate>> requestCertificates(PKCS10CertificationRequest csr) {
069
070        return certificatesClientConfiguration.getURI()
071                .map(uri -> client.get(new Link("self", uri))
072                        .thenApply(ServerResourceDocument::new)
073                        .thenApply(this::getCertificatesRequest)
074                        .thenCompose(sendCertificateRequest(csr))
075                        .thenCompose(toCertificateChain()))
076                .orElseGet(() -> CompletableFuture.failedStage(new IllegalArgumentException("Missing certificates server URI")));
077    }
078
079    private Optional<Link> getCertificatesRequest(ServerResourceDocument certificatesHostApi) {
080        return certificatesHostApi.getServiceByType("certificates").flatMap(sro ->
081                sro.getLinkByRel("request"));
082    }
083
084    private Function<Optional<Link>, CompletionStage<ServiceResourceObject>> sendCertificateRequest(PKCS10CertificationRequest csr) {
085        return requestLink -> requestLink.map(link ->
086        {
087            try {
088                // Convert to PEM format
089                StringWriter stringWriter = new StringWriter();
090                PemWriter pWrt = new PemWriter(stringWriter);
091                pWrt.writeObject(new PemObject(PEMParser.TYPE_CERTIFICATE_REQUEST, csr.getEncoded()));
092                pWrt.close();
093                String csrPem = stringWriter.toString();
094
095                return client.submit(link, new ResourceObject.Builder("certificaterequest")
096                                .attributes(new Attributes.Builder().attribute("csr", csrPem).build())
097                                .build())
098                        .thenApply(ServiceResourceObject::new);
099            } catch (Throwable ex) {
100                return CompletableFuture.<ServiceResourceObject>failedStage(ex);
101            }
102        }).orElseGet(() -> CompletableFuture.failedStage(new IllegalArgumentException("No request link in certificates API")));
103    }
104
105    private Function<ServiceResourceObject, CompletionStage<List<X509Certificate>>> toCertificateChain() {
106        return sro ->
107                sro.getAttributes().attributes().getString("pem").map(certificatePem ->
108                {
109                    try {
110                        CertificateFactory cf = CertificateFactory.getInstance("X.509");
111                        List<X509Certificate> chain = cf.generateCertificates(new ByteArrayInputStream(certificatePem.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8))).stream()
112                                .map(c -> (X509Certificate) c)
113                                .collect(toList());
114
115                        return CompletableFuture.completedStage(chain);
116                    } catch (Throwable e) {
117                        return CompletableFuture.<List<X509Certificate>>failedStage(new CompletionException("Could not parse certificate PEM", e));
118                    }
119                }).orElseGet(() -> CompletableFuture.failedStage(new IllegalArgumentException("Missing PEM in response")));
120    }
121}
